content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: Low volatility (Vol: 23.9%) with mixed breadth (3/8 sectors positive) — low vol supports risk appetite despite limited participation.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Heavy Industry leading: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND. Banking also constructive: AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Retail are lagging: TCELL (1W: -5.70% | 1M: -1.28%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -6.28% | 1M: -6.19%) BELOW TREND, ULKER (1W: -5.07% | 1M: -7.49%) BELOW TREND. Holding & Investment under pressure: KCHOL (1W: -6.86% | 1M: -3.39%) BELOW TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND, SOKM (1W: -7.21% | 1M: -1.54%) BELOW TREND, KCHOL (1W: -6.86% | 1M: -3.39%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -6.28% | 1M: -6.19%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Upside momentum: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND. Downside momentum: TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Selective overweight on large caps that are confirming strength: AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +1.52% | 1M: +1.52%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +0.54% | 1M: +4.00%) ABOVE TREND — banks look defensive-cyclical in this low-vol backdrop.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy Industry the clear cyclical leader: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +2.79% | 1M: +0.94%) ABOVE TREND; watch FROTO (1W: -4.45% | 1M: +3.39%) CORRECTION for stock-specific pullbacks.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Mixed: TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND driving the group while TUPRS (1W: -1.40% | 1M: -12.04%) BELOW TREND and HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND remain weak.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Lean into RISK-ON: overweight Heavy Industry and selective large banks, trim exposure to Technology, Retail and Transportation where breadth is weak; use TKFEN and other deep pullbacks to add size selectively if fundamentals hold.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND for continuation, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND on momentum, AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND for bank-flow confirmation, TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND as a volatility play.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Heavy Industry to confirm leadership, Banking to show whether breadth broadens beyond top names, and Transportation to monitor for spillover risk or mean-reversion opportunities.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 behavior around the recent 1-week trading range — a break above the 1-month highs would confirm expansion while a slip back below short-term support would flip momentum; watch global risk tone, CB communication, and energy/commodity price moves as primary catalysts (vol: 23.9%).

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON tape with low volatility but narrow participation: Heavy Industry and large banks leading while tech, retail and holdings lag. Trade with risk-on bias but respect single-stock volatility — use dips in laggards and profit-take on short-term winners.
